Participate in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code
Provide production support to business users
Establish working relationships with all the productized SCRUM teams and key team members and across the IT organization as appropriate
Verify integration test specifications to ensure proper testing

Key Competencies:
Anticipating and adopting innovations in business-building digital and tech applications
Making sense of complex, high quantity, and sometimes contradictory information to effectively solve problems.
Planning and prioritizing work to meet commitments aligned with org\xe2\x80\x99s goals
Knowing the most effective and efficient processes to get things done with a focus on continuous improvement
Attracting and selecting the best talent to meet current and future business needs
creating a climate where people are motivated to do their best to help the organization achieve its goals

Measures of Success:
Contribute to team improving velocity
Contribute to team reducing the average ticket cycle time IN PROGRESS to RESOLVED
Contribute to team delivering more story tickets
Contribute to team reducing the amount of interruptions
Work with team to deliver at least 90% story completion in a sprint
  Education and Experience:
Bachelors in Computer Science
Building enterprise web applications leveraging object oriented/functional programming concepts.
Building applications using MEAN Stack, Angular 5 or a similar front-end framework
Designing and building APIs using REST/JSON
Database and caching experience, NoSQL and SQL (Elastic Search, MongoDB, Oracle)
Building micro services a strong plus
Responsive design experience using Bootstrap or other CSS frameworks a strong plus
With distributed, cloud-based systems and application design in a SOA environment using AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, etc.) and Containers (Docker, Kubernetes) a strong plus
Delivering e-commerce/consumer websites at scale (thousands of requests/second) under tight latency constraints is a strong plus
CI/CD experience using Jenkins, Atlassian stack a plus
Google Analytics and metrics-based data analysis a plus
E-commerce frameworks such as Hybris, ATG or Broadleaf a plus'

title: b'Software Developer'
job description:
b'Are you a Rockstar software developer? 
CIC Plus, Inc. can use your technical prowess and your passion for writing code as a member of our software development team. The software development team develops, modifies, enhances, and implements complex systems. As a part of the team, you\xe2\x80\x99ll help with developing solutions to meet specification criteria and maintain the current code base.

What we\xe2\x80\x99re all about
We are a leading edge technology company. Our mission is to improve the lives and careers of HR, payroll, and benefits departments through the use of our world-class, online forms management solutions with employee self-service and best-in-class data management, while providing the best client service in the industry.

Our clients include some of the world\xe2\x80\x99s biggest and most innovative brands. At CIC Plus, Inc., we are a collaborative team who believes in having fun and being passionate about what we do. We treat our colleagues and clients with integrity. We focus on our client needs in order to make sure that we can deliver innovative products that they love, helping them find solutions that meet their business challenges. We want to work with colleagues who feel the same way and share these values.

What\xe2\x80\x99s involved?
This role will allow the Software Developer to work with the entire stack of our web based system. You will join an innovative team responsible for delivering solutions built for sustainability, security, and performance. Be a part of our exciting, fast paced team, and be proud of building solutions that drive technology to meet new HR industry demands.

Qualified members of the software development team must be able to do the following effectively:
\xc2\xb7      Be able to write code proficiently in C# & JavaScript/jQuery
\xc2\xb7      Have a working knowledge of MVC 5 (C#)
\xc2\xb7      Have a working knowledge of JavaScript/jQuery & CSS
\xc2\xb7      Write and maintain complex SQL queries, updates and delete statements in T-SQL
\xc2\xb7      Windows Forms (C#)
\xc2\xb7      Assist with troubleshooting enterprise application issues to resolve production problems
\xc2\xb7      Coordinate between Operations and Development for errors occurring in the software
\xc2\xb7      Assist with planning, scheduling, implementing, and monitoring routine tasks required for daily business operations
\xc2\xb7      Utilize approved tools and processes for application support and ensure compliance of others
\xc2\xb7      Have excellent communication and teamwork skills

What are the qualifications? 
This is not an entry level position. To be successful in this endeavor we believe the individual needs experience in a number of areas. If you believe you have the following skills (or most of them), then we\xe2\x80\x99d love to hear from you.
\xc2\xb7      Design and implement solutions using C#, ASP.NET (MVC and Windows Forms)
\xc2\xb7      Good knowledge of JavaScript and jQuery
\xc2\xb7      Ability to perform code reviews and provide critique
\xc2\xb7      Ability to perform research and troubleshoot application and data issues.
\xc2\xb7      Ability to test and provide documentation for internal use.
\xc2\xb7      Ability to independently perform research to solve basic to moderately complex technical issues.
\xc2\xb7      Working knowledge of client-server concepts
\xc2\xb7      General knowledge of business and/or systems analysis
\xc2\xb7      Ability to work on cross-functional teams that may form and disband quickly
\xc2\xb7      General knowledge of TCP/IP protocol and troubleshooting tools
\xc2\xb7      Must possess the ability to learn and understand business processes and relationship of systems and applications used to accomplish those processes
\xc2\xb7      Proficient, analytical, decisive, troubleshooting skills
\xc2\xb7      Ability to write clear instructions for end users

How do I apply?
Please email your resume to jobs@cicplus.com with the following information:
\xc2\xb7      Compensation expectations
\xc2\xb7      Available start date
\xc2\xb7      How you heard about us
\xc2\xb7      Cover letter (Preferred but not required, we\xe2\x80\x99d love to get to know you outside of the resume.)'

title: b'Applications Developer / Analyst Chicago, IL ref'
job description: b"Applications Developer / Analyst Chicago, IL Job Insight: Must Haves: -Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree with degrees in Computer Science or similar technical field. -5+ years of systems development experience working in an Agile development lifecycle plus 3+ years of experience - gathering/documenting requirements and developing technical specifications. - ASP.NET, Relational Databases, JavaScript, SQL Server, XML, Web Services Nice to Haves: ASP Classic (strongly preferred), Flash, Highcharts, C#, VB.NET, Oracle Qualifications The Lead Business Analyst will meet the following criteria: Relevant bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree with degrees in Computer Science or similar technical field. 5+ years of systems development experience working in an Agile development lifecycle plus 3+ years of experience gathering/documenting requirements and developing technical specifications. Required Tool Set Experience: ASP.NET, Relational Databases, JavaScript, SQL Server, XML, Web Services [OTHER POSSIBILITIES] Microsoft .NET Framework for web and windows applications, as well as relational databases and other technologies and tools including, LINQ,, MS Visual Studio.Net, Microsoft Silverlight, CSLA, DotNetNuke, Aspose Total for .net, Telerik controls for Asp.net, JQuery, SharePoint, MS Visio, and Windows Workflow Foundation. Angular, Mongo Optional Tool Set Experience: ASP Classic, Flash, Highcharts, C#, VB.NET, Oracle Excellent analytical and problem solving skills. Ability to solve difficult problems with effective solutions. Strong communication skills in English, both oral and written. Communicates professionally with internal and external contacts. Experience with business analysis, application development and project management principles, practices, techniques and tools. Experience with both legacy (e.g. TFS) and modern (Jira) tool sets. Ability to effectively work independently and in a team. Willing to learn independently with minimal direction and develop new skills quickly. Experience working with offshore/remote development teams in an Agile environment. Notes: Developer who needs to be able to play a bridge role-patient enough to also work with requirements and push the development team to communicate Should not be a manager- they will be expected to do some coding Needs to work onsite in Chicago, IL Needs someone who can bring some discipline to the process Top 3 Skills: Strong Developer who can work in a flexible environment-patience-willing to write requirements to bridge the gap-formal agile process Looking to hire ASAP-Zoom interviews are fine, potential face to face follow up interview Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree is a must 50% coding, 50% helping contracted off shore team with their requirements Coding- majority would be enhancements-NOT BUGS OR NEW PRODUCTS send resume for details 1. What is your Full Legal Name? 2. Have you applied for job in last 6 Months? If yes please provide the details. 3. What is your work Authorization Status? 4. What is your availability date to join? 5. What is your current home location with zip code? 6. What is your desired hourly pay rate? 7. Please provide date of birth in MMDD format (Month and Date only) 8. Please share the link to your candidate's LinkedIn profile\n\nSDL2019-1032"

title: b'Software Engineer'
job description:
b"Job Description
THE COMPANY: Dynamic Consulting Group
DCG is a workforce management and operations consulting company with a commitment is to provide customized, high quality and innovative engineering and management solutions and services for Manufacturing and Operations industry.
POSITION TITLE: Software Engineer
Location: Downtown Chicago, IL
** Please apply only if you have Green Card or US Citizenship **
This is a full-time direct hire position with a major technology company in Chicago, IL. The position has a great future within the company, with an excellent salary and benefits.
Our Client is a leading provider of technology-enabled logistics management services, delivered on a proprietary technology platform, serving the transportation and logistics needs.
As a Software Engineer, you will contribute to engineering of large scale web-based applications to enable business while supporting architectural vision of quality, scalability, performance and function.
Responsibilities
Software Engineer's work in conjunction with Senior Engineer's, Business Analysts, and Business Owners
\xc2\xb7 Contributes to technical design including high-level conceptual diagram, ERD, service contracts using C# and SQL based technologies (open to other languages) in an Agile environment
\xc2\xb7 Work to develop one or several of our web based product offerings
\xc2\xb7 Producing high quality code and addressing technical debt
\xc2\xb7 Support and accountable for timely releases
\xc2\xb7 Carry out root cause analysis on defects to ensure fixes are happening in the right way
\xc2\xb7 Provide mentorship to teammates
\xc2\xb7 As a team member work hand in hand with product owner to break down user stories
\xc2\xb7 Work to continuously advance your skill set
\xc2\xb7 Managing software risk, balancing priorities, going above and beyond the call of duty
Position Requirements
\xc2\xb7 Bachelors in IT / Software Engineering or related fields.
\xc2\xb7 3+ years developing commercial-grade business applications leveraging the following:
\xc2\xb7 Writing code in an OO programming language
\xc2\xb7 Build or maintain fault tolerant systems
\xc2\xb7 Data structure and algorithms
\xc2\xb7 SOA architecture
\xc2\xb7 3+ years developing front end applications leveraging:
\xc2\xb7 Javascript
\xc2\xb7 HTML
\xc2\xb7 CSS
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or Vietnam era or other protected veteran."

job description:

title: b'Front-End Software Engineer'
job description:
b'SecureTrust, a Trustwave division, leads the industry in innovation and processes for achieving and maintaining compliance and security. SecureTrust delivers world-class consulting, compliance and risk assessment services and solutions for the enterprise market as well as tailored merchant risk management programs and solutions for merchant program sponsors around the globe. For more information, visit www.securetrust.com
  SecureTrust, a leader in cloud-based compliance and information security solutions, is seeking a highly talented and motivated Front-End Software Engineer with established professional experience to join SecureTrust\xe2\x80\x99s Product Engineering team.
  Responsibilities:
Work in small, agile teams to design, prototype and build new product offerings and enhance existing products and tools
Collaborate with Product Management to identify, prioritize and document detailed product requirements
Design, develop and document UI features using Dart and the Angular-Dart framework
Create robust automated unit/functional test suites and deployment scripts
Work with internal QA team on system, performance and acceptance testing
  Technical Requirements:
Familiarity with agile/iterative development methodologies (XP, SCRUM, etc.)
Experience developing polished application UIs using web technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
Possess experience interfacing with various back-end technologies, frameworks and services
Knowledge of object-oriented design / back-end development \xe2\x80\x9cnice to have\xe2\x80\x9d but not required
Thorough understanding of responsive web design, fluid layouts and positioning, browser behavior and compatibility, cross-browser issues
Real-world experience building very large scale, high availability applications
  General Requirements:
Ability to work with distributed teams in a dynamic, iterative development process
Occasional overnight travel to other SecureTrust offices in the U.S. may be required
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Familiarity with the security industry is desirable but not required
 
To All Agencies

Please, no phone calls or emails to any employee of Trustwave outside of the Talent Acquisition team. Trustwave\xe2\x80\x99s policy is to only accept resumes from agencies via the Trustwave Agency Portal. Agencies must have a valid fee agreement in place and they must have been assigned the specific requisition to which they submit resumes, by the Talent Acquisition team. Any resume submitted outside of this process will be deemed the sole property of Trustwave and in the event a candidate is submitted outside of this policy is hired, no fee or payment of any kind will be paid.'

title: b'Lead Software Engineer'
job description:
b'Looking for a Lead Software Engineer to oversee a software development team in using the latest web and data technologies to deliver never before seen data analytics tools. Preferring cloud-based solutions, we are developing cutting edge data insight and marketing solutions that conquer the big-data problem space.  We\xe2\x80\x99re looking for smart, enthusiastic, driven individuals who are eager to produce world class solutions for our clients.

Role and Responsibilities

Lead development team in developing tools enabling data analysts to interact with large datasets.
Oversee full lifecycle of software applications & services \xe2\x80\x93 from requirements gathering, architecting, development, and deployment.
Evaluate technologies & lead team through technology selection process.
Drive key technical and architectural decisions.
Mentor team members on best practices and new technologies.
Follow Agile development practices in collaboration with project\xe2\x80\x99s Business Analysts.
Ensure project deliverables and deadlines are satisfied.
Inspire, drive, and encourage innovative solutions.
Monitor and execute continuous feedback and improvement plan to increase development team\xe2\x80\x99s efficiency and productivity.
Integrate tools to improve development process (test driven development, continuous integration, continuous delivery, version control branching strategies, etc).

Desired Skills and Experience
8+ years of application and infrastructure integration experience.
5+ years of web application development
Extensive experience with the Agile product/project development lifecycle and supporting tools.
Excellent communications skills and comfortable presenting to internal groups.
Extensive experience in effort estimation with a track record of accuracy.
Competency in designing for enterprise system performance, scalability and capacity.
Experience with AWS services such as EC2, S3, ELB, Redshift and good knowledge of other AWS components.
Experience configuring, using, and administrating Linux server environments.
Bachelor\xe2\x80\x99s degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent experience.
Preferred Skills
Expertise in Java MVC web application development.
Mastery of a common scripting language (BASH, Ruby, Perl, Python).
Expertise in data modeling, database implementation, and query optimization
Experience with distributed computing on big data.
Familiarity with high availability architectures and disaster recovery
Experience in leading technical direction of software development team'

title: b'Application Developer'
job description:
b"Glanbia Business Services (GBS)

Application Developer



A vacancy has arisen for the role of Application Developer at Glanbia Business Services based in our office in Aurora, Illinois. This is a permanent position & will report to the Programming Team Lead. Full training will be given to the successful candidate.





Overview

Glanbia plc operates with a world-class programming team. The work is of a challenging nature across global implementations of CRM / SAP / BW / SAP Portal / Successfactors / Concor / Cloud Commerce and Ariba.

Compilation of technical Specifications

Keep up to date with trends/developments in area
Upgrades and Safeguard

Javascript & HTML5

title: b'Software Engineer'
job description:
b"About Us

Agentis is a Chicago-based data analytics and SaaS platform provider that empowers energy providers and their business customers to optimize energy consumption. Our SaaS customer engagement platform has been deployed to over 2 million businesses nationwide and growing. We combine our strengths of data visualization, data science, and software development to create compelling and powerful customer experience. At the intersection of Clean Tech and Information Technology, Agentis has an exciting and compelling mission with a very passionate and talented team leading the charge.

Interested in making a positive impact and creating great technology? We're looking for a Software Engineer to be part of our growing data integration team. As a Software Engineer you will play an important role in developing and integrating ETL pipeline for our SaaS application. You must have solid communication skills, be detail oriented, and show leadership and an exemplary work ethic.

Job Description

Our Director of Customer Success and Operations will:
Develop and expand ETL pipeline for Agentis Platform
Integrate data feeds for new and existing clients
Write unit and integration tests to ensure continuous data integrity
Expand and maintain ETL process documentation
Troubleshoot data quality issues
Adhere to information security policies

Skills Required
Passion for server-side development and technology
Experience writing PHP applications using MVC frameworks
Understanding of object-oriented programming concepts
Understanding of relational databases and SQL
Working knowledge of Git or other version control system
Strong quantitative and analytical skills with an understanding of web analytics, optimization, and reporting tools
Helpful If You Have
Front-end development skills utilizing HTML, CSS and JavaScript
Experience writing unit or integration tests
Experience writing APIs
Exposure to cloud providers such as AWS, Rackspace, Azure
Linux administration skills

Compensation
We offer a competitive salary, benefits and bonus structure based on experience and performance.
We let you choose between a Mac or Windows workstation and software you need for development
We value teamwork, innovation and productivity and foster an exciting and committed work environment that will help you become successful and grow in your position."

title: b'Software Engineer'
job description:
b"LaSalle Network is currently partnered with a global e-commerce leader headquartered in Chicago, IL to help build out a new software development team to support an upgrade in systems and software. This person will be responsible for working with stakeholders to identify requirements and build a new consumer facing e-commerce platform from the ground up that is used for over 1 billion transactions annually.



Software Engineer Responsibilities:



Work with stakeholders and technology teams to understand customer needs and plan the software build out
Build new web-based software for both internal and external users
Lead full life cycle Java development for a new product
Implement bleeding edge technologies to better the functionality and UI of the system
Collaborate with other team members for all aspects of software development


Software Engineer Qualifications:



3+ years of Java development experience
Strong background in building and consuming RESTful APIs
Experience assisting in building microservices architecture
Ability to mentor junior members of the team when needed
Understanding of best practices as they relate to software development
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science preferred


Thank you,



Kyle Rickert

Sr. Project Manager, Software Engineering Practice Lead

LaSalle Network



Keywords and Related Terms: Java, Software Engineer, e-commerce



LaSalle Network is an Equal Opportunity Employer m/f/d/v.



LaSalle Network is Chicago's leading provider of professional staffing and recruiting services. Specializing in technology, accounting and finance, administrative, call center, human resources, marketing, and executive search, LaSalle serves companies of all sizes and across all industries. Since inception in 1998, LaSalle Network has served over 2,500 clients and placed over 25,000 candidates in temporary, temporary to permanent and permanent positions."
